p: The literature indicates that the chemical composition of MSM from chickens fluctuates, as it depends, inter alia, on the production method and the machine used as well as the parts of deboned carcass (Be≈Çkot et al., 2013; Botka-Petrak et al., 2011). Henckel et al. ( 2004) found that the fat, protein, and water content of low-pressure MSM made from chicken breast muscles was 10.35, 18.78, and 70.27%, which is similar to the results seen in our study.
